short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Right click and select the text you want us to speak out.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The sole purpose of the speakit exntension is to speak loadly the  selected text. This is to help the online reader who reads news, educational content or any other informtion on the web and struggle to pronounce the new/difficult words. 'Speakit' will help you, it will read out loudly the word for you so you do not quit your reading just because you are not able to prounounce a word.
